envImport 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Get data_name data

Source: R/get_data.R
get_data.Rd

Import data, running get_data_name to requery original data source, if get_new. Data is saved to (and imported from) file.path(save_dir, data_name, "paste0(data_name,"_raw.rds")). save_dir and get_new can be passed via ... to get_data_name, otherwise, default values from get_data_name are used (respectively: FALSE and here::here("out", "ds", data_name, paste0(data_name, "_raw.rds")))

get_data(data_name, ...)

Arguments

data_name

Character. Name of data source. e.g. 'tern' or 'galah'.

...

Passed to get_data_name

Value

Dataframe, either loaded from save_dir or from a new query to data_name. If new data is queried, .rds results file will be created, overwriting if necessary. Timing and number of records log in save_dir.

See also

Other Help with combining data sources: remap_data_names()

Examples


  library("envImport")

  out_dir <- file.path(system.file(package = "envImport"), "examples")

  # galah--------

  ## config -------
  galah::galah_config(email = Sys.getenv("GBIF_email")
                      , username = Sys.getenv("GBIF_user")
                      , password = Sys.getenv("GBIF_pwd")
                      , caching = TRUE
                      , download_reason_id = 10 # testing
                      )

  old_atlas <- galah::galah_config()$atlas$region

  galah::galah_config(atlas = "GBIF")
#> Atlas selected: Global Biodiversity Information Facility (GBIF) [Global]

  ## 01: atlas = gbif --------

  qry01 <- galah::galah_call() %>%
    galah::galah_identify("Ardeotis australis") %>%
    galah::galah_filter(year == 2000) %>%
    galah::atlas_occurrences() %>%
    dplyr::collect()
#> Current queue length: 0
#> -------
#> Downloading


  ## 02: atlas = ala ----------

  galah::galah_config(atlas = "ALA")
#> Atlas selected: Atlas of Living Australia (ALA) [Australia]

  galah::galah_config(email = Sys.getenv("ALA_email"))

  # 'qry' used for both qry02 and qry03
  qry <- galah::galah_call() %>%
    galah::galah_identify("Ardeotis australis") %>%
    galah::galah_filter(year == 2000)

  qry02 <- qry %>%
    galah::atlas_occurrences() %>%
    dplyr::collect()
#> Request for 857 occurrences placed in queue
#> Current queue length: 2
#> -------------------------
#> Downloading

  # similar (but not identical) # of records
    # difference due to predicates?
  nrow(qry01)
#> [1] 856
  nrow(qry02)
#> [1] 857


  ## 03: get_galah ---------

  qry03 <- get_galah(save_dir = fs::path(out_dir, "qry03")
                     , data_map = data_map
                     , qry = qry
                     )
#> save_file will be H:/temp/nige/RtmpMLLLcG/temp_libpath432815653495/envImport/examples/qry03/galah/galah.parquet

  nrow(qry03) == nrow(qry02)
#> [1] FALSE

  # names from data_map
  names(qry02)
#> [1] "recordID"         "scientificName"   "taxonConceptID"   "decimalLatitude" 
#> [5] "decimalLongitude" "eventDate"        "occurrenceStatus" "dataResourceName"
  names(qry03)
#>  [1] "data_name"      "site"           "date"           "lat"           
#>  [5] "long"           "original_name"  "common"         "nsx"           
#>  [9] "occ_derivation" "quantity"       "survey"         "rel_metres"    
#> [13] "method"         "obs"            "denatured"      "kingdom"       
#> [17] "occ"            "year"           "month"         

  ## 04: get_galah with profile -------

  qry04 <- get_galah(save_dir = fs::path(out_dir, "qry04")
                     , data_map = data_map
                     , qry = qry %>%
                       galah::apply_profile(CSDM)
                     )
#> save_file will be H:/temp/nige/RtmpMLLLcG/temp_libpath432815653495/envImport/examples/qry04/galah/galah.parquet

  # lost some records due to the profile
  nrow(qry03) > nrow(qry04)
#> [1] TRUE

  # bio_all --------
  ## get_galah for aoi -------
  bio_all_galah <- get_galah(aoi = envImport::aoi
                             , save_dir = out_dir
                             , data_map = data_map
                             , sub_dir = "bio_all"
                             )
#> save_file will be H:/temp/nige/RtmpMLLLcG/temp_libpath432815653495/envImport/examples/bio_all/galah.parquet

  ## get_tern for aoi --------
  bio_all_tern <- get_tern(aoi = envImport::aoi
                           , save_dir = out_dir
                           , data_map = data_map
                           , sub_dir = "bio_all"
                           )
#> save_file will be H:/temp/nige/RtmpMLLLcG/temp_libpath432815653495/envImport/examples/bio_all/tern.parquet

  ## or using get_data -------
  # to get both galah and tern
  datas <- c("galah", "tern")

  purrr::map(datas
              , \(x) get_data(x
                              , save_dir = out_dir
                              , get_new = FALSE
                              , aoi = envImport::aoi
                              , data_map = data_map
                              , sub_dir = "bio_all"
                              )
              )
#> save_file will be H:/temp/nige/RtmpMLLLcG/temp_libpath432815653495/envImport/examples/bio_all/galah.parquet
#> save_file will be H:/temp/nige/RtmpMLLLcG/temp_libpath432815653495/envImport/examples/bio_all/tern.parquet
#> [[1]]
#> # A tibble: 97,194 × 19
#>    data_name site  date         lat  long original_name             common nsx  
#>  * <chr>     <chr> <date>     <dbl> <dbl> <chr>                     <chr>  <lgl>
#>  1 galah     NA    1921-01-06 -34.2  141. Rhodanthe tietkensii      Tietk… NA

#>  3 galah     NA    2022-09-05 -34.2  141. Limnodynastes dumerilii   Easte… NA

#>  5 galah     NA    2019-09-15 -34.2  141. Medicago sativa           Lucer… NA

#>  8 galah     NA    1916-10-06 -34.2  141. Grevillea huegelii        Comb … NA

#> # ℹ 97,184 more rows
#> # ℹ 11 more variables: occ_derivation <chr>, quantity <dbl>, survey <chr>,
#> #   rel_metres <dbl>, method <chr>, obs <chr>, denatured <dbl>, kingdom <chr>,
#> #   occ <dbl>, year <dbl>, month <dbl>

#> [[2]]
#> # A tibble: 154 × 15
#>    data_name site     date         lat  long original_name lifeform cover height
#>    <chr>     <chr>    <date>     <dbl> <dbl> <chr>         <chr>    <dbl>  <dbl>
#>  1 tern      SAARIV0… 2015-08-12 -34.1  141. Acacia steno… NA       0.064  NA   
#>  2 tern      SAARIV0… 2015-08-12 -34.1  141. Atriplex rha… SD       0.019   0.4 
#>  3 tern      SAARIV0… 2015-08-12 -34.1  141. Chenopodium … SC       0.05    1

#>  5 tern      SAARIV0… 2015-08-12 -34.1  141. Disphyma cra… NA       0.017  NA   
#>  6 tern      SAARIV0… 2015-08-12 -34.1  141. Enchylaena t… NA       0.037  NA

#>  8 tern      SAARIV0… 2015-08-12 -34.1  141. Eucalyptus c… NA       0.201  NA   
#>  9 tern      SAARIV0… 2015-08-12 -34.1  141. Eucalyptus l… NA       0.388  NA   
#> 10 tern      SAARIV0… 2015-08-12 -34.1  141. Melaleuca la… LB       0.015   4   
#> # ℹ 144 more rows
#> # ℹ 6 more variables: obs <chr>, kingdom <chr>, quad_metres <dbl>, occ <int>,
#> #   year <dbl>, month <dbl>
#> 

  ## single dataset --------
  bio_all <- arrow::open_dataset(fs::dir_ls(fs::path(out_dir, "bio_all")
                                            , regexp = "\\.parquet"
                                            )
                                 ) %>%
    dplyr::collect()

  # 'bio_all' is now the sum of its components
  nrow(bio_all) == nrow(bio_all_galah) + nrow(bio_all_tern)
#> [1] TRUE

  # clean up -------
  # return to original atlas
  galah::galah_config(atlas = old_atlas)
